package.description:
ROS bindings for Parallax Eddie robot.
This is a generic driver for Parallax Eddie Robot ( http://www.parallax.com/eddie ). The package publishes sensor data on several topics, as well as providing services to call functions to the serial board. The package also includes a controller to navigate the robot with linear/angular velocity. At the moment, this package is considered a beta release. Development is still in progress.
